name: The New Neighborhood (Beta)
description:
***Click Play Twice Each Time!***

Press "Q and E" to see the endings (press again to go back to game)

"W,A,S,D" or arrows to move

"space" to interact or talk to people or "click"

Press "E" to feed your neighbor some sleeping pills

Press "B" to buy something at the storrr

"Click" the food to grab it

press "space", "click" "W,A,S,D" on the circles to go to a new place
